name: codeup-flow
title: Codeup Flow
description: Raycast extension to list codeup flow status
author: yggdrasil

commands.name: flow
commands.title: Codeup Flow
commands.subtitle: List codeup flow status and logs
commands.description: list codeup flow status and logs & quick jump to the flow

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
